game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden within the Lost Temple.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the jungle, holding secrets and treasures of a bygone era. Your mission is to explore this temple, overcome its deadly traps, and retrieve the legendary artifact said to be hidden within its walls.

task.objective: Navigate through the Jungle to Reach the Temple
task.description: Make your way through the dense jungle, avoiding wild beasts and hostile natives.
Decipher the ancient symbols etched into the temple's entrance to unlock the doors.

task.objective: Retrieve the Artifact from the Inner Sanctum
task.description: Avoid deadly traps and battle fierce guardians to reach the inner sanctum where the artifact is kept.
task.location: Inner Sanctum of the Lost Temple
